QUERY: SELECT nor.category_id, DATE( TIMESTAMP_ADD(nor.create_time, INTERVAL 7 hour) ) ds, COUNT(1) y FROM `ws_order_recharge.order_recharge` nor WHERE nor.create_time {} TIMESTAMP_ADD( timestamp '{}', INTERVAL -7 hour ) AND nor.order_status IN (700, 701, 702) AND category_id IN (1,2) GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 1, 2
